title: WTB N43 Barry, Clark, Cummings, Ford, Ray - favorite 19th century set
author: epike3

posts.post_title: WTB N43 Barry, Clark, Cummings, Ford, Ray - favorite 19th century set
posts.post_content:
looking to buy mid-grade and prefer ungraded but will consider any condition N43: Barry, Clark, Cummings, Ford, Ray

Thanks for taking a look.

These cards are amazing, still look great all these years later!

Please send a PM and/or email ehpiiiATaolDOTcom.

Best,
Ed

I have a newly graded N43 Clarke, World Champion Walker PSA2
no paper loss Asking $95.  I don't know too much about these... I'm not sure if that is high or low... seems about right … I know these are tough cards.  Thanks.  Not really sure how to post/Reply, etc... I've been a member for a while; however, I'm only on here 1-2 times per year.  Thanks
I can't seem to attached the pics here... you can email at [url]alex@roofroof.com[/url] if interested
Alex

Hi, thanks for posting I would be happy to see your N43 Clarke as well. 

Best,
Ed
